text: Five Nights at Freddy's 2 is an upcoming American supernatural horror movie. It is expected to be released on December 5, 2025. It was directed by Emma Tammi and produced by Scott Cawthon and Jason Blum. It is based on the Five Nights at Freddy's video game series and is sequel to the 2023 movie Five Nights at Freddy's. Principal photography for the movie started in November 2024 with Goodwin revealing that she had recorded her first lines for the movie. == Cast == ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2025 movies Category:2020s English-language movies Category:2020s supernatural movies Category:2020s horror movies Category:American sequel movies Category:American supernatural movies Category:American horror movies Category:Five Nights at Freddy's Category:Movies based on video games Category:Robot movies Category:Supernatural horror movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Upcoming movies Category:Upcoming sequel movies
title: Five Nights at Freddy's 2 (movie)
